DataElement.preferredDefinition: the number quantifying the units of glass or plastic bottles sent for analysis from a sample of the clear portion of blood (after removal of blood cells and clotting proteins) collected for research.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: related to a sample of the clear portion of blood (after removal of blood cells and clotting proteins) collected for research purposes and sent for analysis in a stoppered glass or plastic bottle.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The clear liquid part of the blood that remains after blood cells and clotting proteins have been removed.:Specimen; a bit of tissue or blood or urine that is taken or used for research purposes.

Concepts.definition: The clear portion of the blood that remains after the removal of the blood cells and the clotting proteins.

A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.

Property.preferredDefinition: A small, often stoppered glass or plastic bottle for holding medicines and chemicals.:Submitted; referred for judgment or consideration.

Concepts.definition: A small, often stoppered glass or plastic bottle for holding fluids.
The act of referring for judgment or consideration by others; the act of handing over something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: retired DEC; updated to make ISO compliant for use with new CDE

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The quantity of the specified item.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.

Concepts.definition: Determining the number or amount of something.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/11/17 tt transferred context, added reg status and CSI per Round 5 finalization task.

ReferenceDocuments.description: Number of tubes of serum submitted

DataElement.changeDescription: revisions made to provide unique DEC and ISO 11179 compliance for change for Trial Use
